# UCB CS294 深度强化学习中文笔记（谢天）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/ucb-cs294-shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zhongwen-biji-xietian
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/ucb-cs294-shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zhongwen-biji-xietian
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install ucb-cs294-shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zhongwen-biji-xietian
ucb-cs294-shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zhongwen-biji-xietian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g ucb-cserjiusi-shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zhongwen-biji-xietian
ucb-cserjiusi-shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zhongwen-biji-xietian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
